Topic.Title: Looking for feedback on a pixel art text adventure about an emotionally driven robot

Posts.EditableText:
Hi there,

I'm part of the team working on 'Electric Sleep', a pixel art text adventure where you explore a miniature world as an emotionally driven robot, and discover unique experiences with each new emotion.

We've just released an early stage demo, which we'd love some feedback on. You can download it here:

https://matwek.itch.io/electric-sleep

Many thanks and hope you enjoy it!

Jack
